subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sharaud Curry scored a season-high 26 points, leading Providence to its first Big East win of the season in a 74-59 victory over St. John’s on Sunday.
snippet: Sharaud Curry scored a season-high 26 points, leading Providence to its first Big East win of the season in a 74-59 victory over St. John’s on Sunday.
